ABOUT THE GAME
Old Testament Bible Quiz-VERSION 1 An easy-to-use app for testing your ability to answer some of the Old Testament Bible questions. The score is accumulated as you progress. After answering the last question, you are taken to the results page to see your final score. While on this page, you can either choose Play Again or Quit. This app is self-contained and does not require an internet connection. It is an excellent app for kids, individual students and even adults.
